com.ccjk.cybex.barcodegen.print.label

Class LabelDesignProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ccjk.cybex.barcodegen.print.label.LabelDesignProvider

  • public class LabelDesignProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Divish on 6/14/2016. Gateway class for actual Label generation. It holds access to artworks and their methods to produce the label; All methods are staic and is used as a helper class

      static void loadBackground()
      Some labels like stroller labels where designed with a background image to make sure that the label generated to the correct size These backgrounds need to be prefetched and will be accessed by the artwork files during generation

    • Method Detail

      • loadBackground

        public static void loadBackground()
        Some labels like stroller labels where designed with a background image to make sure that the label generated to the correct size These backgrounds need to be prefetched and will be accessed by the artwork files during generation

      • getLabel

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage getLabel(java.lang.String name,
                                                    Order order,
                                                    int count)
                                             throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                    java.lang.InstantiationException
        Method used to produce the label from an artwork name.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the arwork. Has to be correspond exactly to the file found in the Artwork folder questionMain.artworkPath() without file extension
        order - The order object for which the label has to be generated
        count - THe serial number to use on the label
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.lang.InstantiationException - If the artwork file does not exist

      • getBarcodeAmount

        public static int getBarcodeAmount(java.lang.String name,
                                   Order order)
        question LabelDesignMultipleBarcodes Return the amount of serial numbers that an Artwork will consume
        Parameters:
        name - name of the artwork without file extension. Must be present in Artwork Folder
        order - Order for which label has to be generated
        Returns:
        Number of serials that the artwork will consume

      • getArtwork

        public static LabelDesign getArtwork(java.lang.String name)
                              throws java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                     java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Get the artwork class which has the capability to produce a specific Label type e.d Product Label
        Parameters:
        name - name of the artwork must correpond to a file in the Artwork folder without file extension
        Returns:
        LabelDesign
        Throws:
        java.lang.InstantiationException

                                                           int count)
                                                    throws java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                                           java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Concatenate multiple generated Labels of a single serial together for preview
        Parameters:
        order - Order from which the labels must be generated
        count - Serial number to use fon the labels
        Returns:
        Mosaic of the labels
        Throws:
        java.lang.InstantiationException
